entries.title: James Cameron did the experiment: Titanic’s Jack probably wouldn’t have survived
entries.description: Documentary also revisits lifeboat situation and whether the ship broke in half.

entries.title: New battery seems to offer it all: lithium-metal/lithium-air electrodes
entries.description: In the lab at least, its materials are stable for over 1,000 cycles.

entries.title: US woman has walked around with untreated TB for over a year, now faces jail
entries.description: Recent X-rays of her lungs were so bad, doctors thought she had cancer.

entries.title: Getty sues Stability AI for copying 12M photos and imitating famous watermark
entries.description: Getty lawsuit against Stability AI could change how courts view web scraping.

entries.title: Dealmaster: Best Super Bowl deals for 4K, OLED, and QLED TVs
entries.description: In the market for a new TV? Now is the perfect time to score a big deal.

entries.title: Hackers are mass infecting servers worldwide by exploiting a patched hole
entries.description: Servers running unpatched versions of ESXi are sitting ducks for ESXiArgs attacks.

entries.title: Apple could skip an M2 Mac Studio update to boost Apple Silicon Mac Pro
entries.description: That's one way to address the potential overlap between the two high-end Macs.

entries.title: Report: Microsoft expects UK to block Activision merger deal
entries.description: UK inquiry's preliminary findings could be issued as early as this week.

entries.title: Monstrous DIY mechanical keyboard cost $14,000 to build
entries.description: Unlike other novelty jumbo keyboards, this one has lubed switches and a numpad.

entries.title: Twitter suspended 400K for child abuse content but only reported 8K to police
entries.description: Twitter’s internal detection of child sexual abuse materials may be failing.

entries.title: Judge tosses Joy-Con drift class action because of Switch’s pop-up EULA
entries.description: Kids can't sign the license, but that also doesn't give them the right to sue.

entries.title: How Musk beat Tesla fraud lawsuit: Juror says case relied too much on tweets
entries.description: Jury sided with Musk despite judge ruling his Tesla tweets were false and reckless.

entries.title: Bloatware pushes the Galaxy S23 Android OS to an incredible 60GB
entries.description: Samsung's Android build is 4x bigger than Google's—twice the size of Windows 11.

entries.title: Endless Seinfeld episode grinds to a halt after AI comic violates Twitch guidelines
entries.description: Unintended transphobic act by AI-powered Jerry Seinfeld clone leads to 14-day ban.

entries.title: Ars Archivum: Top cloud backup services worth your money
entries.description: We tested five consumer-friendly cloud backup services and found a clear winner.

entries.title: Tesla raises Model Y prices after Treasury says it counts as an SUV
entries.description: After dropping prices by up to $13,000, now they've increased by up to $2,000.

entries.title: Big Tech companies use cloud computing arms to pursue alliances with AI groups
entries.description: Deals between Big Tech and "generative AI" startups raise competition concerns.

entries.title: Major earthquake devastates areas of southern Turkey and northern Syria
entries.description: The early death toll is 1,600 people, but this number will grow.

entries.title: Volkswagen is recalling the MY2021 ID.4 for a battery software update
entries.description: New software fixes the battery management and pulse inverter control modules.

entries.title: Hell is other humans in HBO’s The Last of Us episode 4
entries.description: Kyle and Andrew get some whiplash jumping from punny jokes to fascistic Kansans.
